title: Visual Trust: switch first grid image to external URL

requirements.summary: Update Visual Trust section so the first grid image uses the provided external URL while keeping all other images, layout, and ImageWithFallback behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/sections/VisualTrustSection.tsx, the first Visual Trust image renders using src="https://i.postimg.cc/DfNT4zDB/IMG-20260214-041839.png" (not passed through getGeneratedAssetUrl).
All other Visual Trust images continue to load from their existing generated asset filenames via getGeneratedAssetUrl.
The Visual Trust grid layout, aspect ratio, hover effects, and ImageWithFallback loading/fallback UI remain unchanged.
The change does not affect the Hero section image behavior or any other site images.

file_operations.description: Adjust the Visual Trust images list/rendering so the first item uses the external URL "https://i.postimg.cc/DfNT4zDB/IMG-20260214-041839.png" directly (bypassing getGeneratedAssetUrl), while all remaining items continue to use their current generated asset filenames via getGeneratedAssetUrl; preserve existing markup, styling classes, aspect ratio container, hover effects, and ImageWithFallback props/behavior.
